verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> happened לִתְשׁוּבַ֨ת <WH8666> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> And it came to pass after the year לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <WH6256> at the time צֵ֣את <WH3318> go forth הַמַּלְאֿכִ֗ים <WH4428> kings וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֡ד <WH1732> [to battle] that David אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָב֩ <WH3097> Joab וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֨יו <WH5650> and his servants עִמּ֜וֹ <WH5973> with וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> with him and all Israel וַיַּשְׁחִ֙תוּ֙ <WH7843> and they destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <WH6696> and besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and רַבָּ֑ה <WH7237> Rabbah וְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> But David יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> tarried still בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem ס

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> now when הָעֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> evening וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> that David מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> from מִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <WH4904> from off his bed וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ֙ <WH1980> and walked עַל־ <WH5921> on גַּ֣ג <WH1406> upon the roof בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> he saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a woman רֹחֶ֖צֶת <WH7364> washing מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and from הַגָּ֑ג <WH1406> and from the roof וְהָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> herself and the woman טוֹבַ֥ת <WH2896> beautiful מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> to look upon מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [was] very

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David וַיִּדְרֹ֖שׁ <WH1875> and enquired לָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> after the woman וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And [one] said הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise בַּת־ שֶׁ֣בַע <WH1339> [Is] not this Bathsheba בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֱלִיעָ֔ם <WH463> of Eliam אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife אוּרִיָּ֥ה <WH223> of Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <WH2850> Hittite

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David מַלְאָכִ֜ים <WH4397> messengers וַיִּקָּחֶ֗הָ <WH3947> and took וַתָּב֤וֹא <WH935> her and she came in אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> unto him and he lay עִמָּ֔הּ <WH5973> with וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> she מִתְקַדֶּ֖שֶׁת <WH6942> with her for she was purified מִטֻּמְאָתָ֑הּ <WH2932> from her uncleanness וַתָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> and she returned אֶל־ <WH413> to her בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <WH1004> unto her house

וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> conceived הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> And the woman וַתִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> and sent וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> and told לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said הָרָ֥ה <WH2030> I [am] with child אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> to Joab שְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> [saying] Send אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <WH223> me Uriah הַחִתִּ֑י <WH2850> the Hittite וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶת־ <WH853> אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <WH223> Uriah אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> to David

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> was come אוּרִיָּ֖ה <WH223> And when Uriah אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וַיִּשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> demanded דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto him David לִשְׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> did יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> [of him] how Joab וְלִשְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> did הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and how the people וְלִשְׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> prospered הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> and how the war

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David לְא֣וּרִיָּ֔ה <WH223> to Uriah רֵ֥ד <WH3381> Go down לְבֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> to thy house וּרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> and wash רַגְלֶ֑יךָ <WH7272> thy feet וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> departed out אֽוּרִיָּה֙ <WH223> And Uriah מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וַתֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> was sent אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> and there followed מַשְׂאַ֥ת <WH4864> him a mess הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [of meat] from the king

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> slept אוּרִיָּ֗ה <WH223> But Uriah פֶּ֚תַח <WH6607> at the door בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's אֵ֖ת <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> with all the servants אֲדֹנָ֑יו <WH113> of his lord וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not יָרַ֖ד <WH3381> and went not down אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> to his house

וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <WH5046> And when they had told לְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not יָרַ֥ד <WH3381> went not down אוּרִיָּ֖ה <WH223> Uriah אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> unto his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> David אֶל־ <WH413> to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <WH223> unto Uriah הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> along אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בָ֔א <WH935> Camest מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> how לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָרַ֥דְתָּ <WH3381> down אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אוּרִיָּ֜ה <WH223> And Uriah אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David הָ֠אָרוֹן <WH727> The ark וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> and Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> and Judah יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> abide בַּסֻּכּ֗וֹת <WH5521> in tents וַאדֹנִ֨י <WH113> and my lord יוֹאָ֜ב <WH3097> Joab וְעַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> and the servants אֲדֹנִ֨י <WH113> of my lord עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> fields חֹנִ֔ים <WH2583> are encamped וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> shall I אָב֧וֹא <WH935> then go אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּיתִ֛י <WH1004> into mine house לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> and to drink וְלִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> and to lie עִם־ <WH5973> with אִשְׁתִּ֑י <WH802> ess חַיֶּ֙ךָ֙ <WH2416> liveth וְחֵ֣י <WH2416> and the life נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul אִֽם־ <WH518> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> I will not do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <WH223> to Uriah שֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> Tarry בָּזֶ֛ה <WH2088> here גַּם־ <WH1571> also הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> here to day וּמָחָ֣ר <WH4279> also and to morrow אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֑ךָּ <WH7971> I will let thee depart וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> abode אוּרִיָּ֧ה <WH223> So Uriah בִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּמִֽמָּחֳרָֽת׃ <WH4283> and the morrow

וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> had called ל֣וֹ דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> And when David וַיֹּ֧אכַל <WH398> him he did eat לְפָנָ֛יו <WH6440> before וַיֵּ֖שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink וַֽיְשַׁכְּרֵ֑הוּ <WH7937> him and he made him drunk וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> he went out בָעֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> and at even לִשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> to lie בְּמִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <WH4904> on his bed עִם־ <WH5973> with עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> with the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> of his lord וְאֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> to his house לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָרָֽד׃ <WH3381> but went not down

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> And it came to pass in the morning וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <WH3789> wrote דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> that David סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> a letter אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> to Joab וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> and sent בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> [it] by the hand אוּרִיָּֽה׃ <WH223> of Uriah

וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <WH3789> And he wrote בַּסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the letter לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Set אֶת־ <WH853> אֽוּרִיָּ֗ה <WH223> ye Uriah אֶל־ <WH413> about מוּל֙ <WH4136> against פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> the front הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> battle הַֽחֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> of the hottest וְשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7725> and retire מֵאַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> ye from him וְנִכָּ֥ה <WH5221> that he may be smitten וָמֵֽת׃ <WH4191> and die ס

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become בִּשְׁמ֥וֹר <WH8104> observed יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> And it came to pass when Joab אֶל־ <WH413> on הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> that he assigned אֶת־ <WH853> א֣וּרִיָּ֔ה <WH223> Uriah אֶל־ <WH413> at הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> unto a place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> where he knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> that valiant שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <WH3318> went out אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> And the men הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> and fought אֶת־ <WH854> against יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> with Joab וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> and there fell מִן־ <WH4480> and some הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> [some] of the people מֵעַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> of the servants דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיָּ֕מָת <WH4191> died גַּ֖ם <WH1571> also אוּרִיָּ֥ה <WH223> and Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <WH2850> the Hittite

וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> sent יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> Then Joab וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> and told לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> all the things הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> concerning the war

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> And charged אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> the messenger לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כְּכַלּוֹתְךָ֗ <WH3615> When thou hast made an end אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the matters הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of the war לְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> of telling אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> unto the king

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> happens אִֽם־ <WH518> and if תַּעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> arise חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> wrath הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And if so be that the king's וְאָמַ֣ר <WH559> and he say לְךָ֔ מַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> Why נִגַּשְׁתֶּ֥ם <WH5066> unto thee Wherefore approached ye so nigh אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> unto the city לְהִלָּחֵ֑ם <WH3898> when ye did fight הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> ? knew אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they יֹר֖וּ <WH3384> ye not that they would shoot מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> wall

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הִכָּ֞ה <WH5221> Who smote אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֣לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֻבֶּ֗שֶׁת <WH3380> Jerubbesheth הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not אִשָּׁ֡ה <WH802> ess הִשְׁלִ֣יכָה <WH7993> cast עָלָיו֩ <WH5921> and פֶּ֨לַח <WH6400> a piece רֶ֜כֶב <WH7393> of a millstone מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> on הַֽחוֹמָה֙ <WH2346> upon him from the wall וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> that he died בְּתֵבֵ֔ץ <WH8405> Taberah לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> how long נִגַּשְׁתֶּ֖ם <WH5066> go אֶל־ <WH413> on הַֽחוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> the wall וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> answer גַּ֗ם <WH1571> again עַבְדְּךָ֛ <WH5650> thou Thy servant אוּרִיָּ֥ה <WH223> Uriah הַחִתִּ֖י <WH2850> the Hittite מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> is dead

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> departed הַמַּלְאָ֑ךְ <WH4397> So the messenger וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> and shewed לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after שְׁלָח֖וֹ <WH7971> had sent יוֹאָֽב׃ <WH3097> all that Joab
